name: grapefruit
description: It's a simple grapefruit, cutted in half. Maybe we ate the other half... maybe not.

name: Bananart
description: It's art in a shape of a banana. Yes, a fruit. If it was art it should come with duct tape. (it doesn't inclue duct tape)

name: egg-plant
description: Literally, it's an egg with a plant inside. (NO IT'S NOT A VEGETABLE, STOP EMAILING US)

name: MEGA PHONE
description: It's like a phone... BUT LOUDER!!!.

name: pipe
description: perfect gift for your children!. We don't recommend taking it to airports.

name: Gameboy
description: It's yellow, like pikachu, but charged with batteries. Games not included.

name: old phone
description: yes, in ancient times, people used to use this. and now we sell it, in yellow as the price of a brand new submarine.

name: Stapler
description: A simple office supply. No, you are not buying a company.

name: lolliplate
description: The original product was the plate, but the photographer left a lollipop over it, now we are selling both things, and with a higher price.

name: macaron
description: NO! IT'S NOT THE PRESIDENT OF FRANCE. - We present you, the world famous macaron, a soft, crunchy and tasty pastry, specially made for you.
